response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you, which I believe perfectly aligns with your needs and expectations. Given its exceptional value and quality, it's worth noting that the product holds a significant importance for me, reflecting its true worth at $15,000. However, considering your appreciation for the product, I propose an offer that I hope will be mutually beneficial. For you, the price would be set at $12,000, allowing you to secure this remarkable item at a favorable rate while ensuring a fair return for us. I look forward to your consideration and the opportunity to discuss further if needed. Thank you for your time and interest.", "product_price": 12000}
